thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com
thread.title: M, Towns
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by M, Towns

author: M, Towns
title: M, Towns
text: The Pelican hand-held shower filter system arrived in just a few days after ordering, and is proving to be the best I've ever used. I could tell the difference in my hair and skin almost immediately. I've been using a shower filter for years and realize now it wasn't giving me the quality of water that I've found with Pelican. So happy I ordered it!
